Anyone know of a simple way or if it's possible trigger a MODAL pop-up post form submission using a HubSpot form??

I'm triggering modals with jQuery the standard way by using something like this.
`<a href="#modal-pop" rel="modal:open" >POP</a>`

I'm just uncertain how to append any logic to a specific form in HubSpot.  Any clues are appreciated.

Have you tried the on form submit event and within that use JS to open your modal popup?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/global-form-events>
<@UDJV5B73R> I haven't tried that and really appreciate the link. I'll look into this. Thanks so much.

In my code this:

`Value of first name: {{ owner_fullname|string }}`

Should actually say:

`Value of fullname: {{ owner_fullname|string }}`
